io.atomix.core.idgenerator

Interface AsyncAtomicIdGenerator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AsyncPrimitive, DistributedPrimitive

    public interface AsyncAtomicIdGenerator
extends AsyncPrimitive
    An async ID generator for generating globally unique numbers.
